item.title: test post
item.description: echo "hello world !!" exports.byGlobby = function (userOptions) { return globbyFiles(userOptions.svgs) .then(foundFiles => { return exports.byFiles(foundFiles, userOptions) }) } exports.byFiles = function (inputSvgFiles, userOptions) { let options = Object.assign({}, defaultOptions, userOptions); return getGlyphDatas(inputSvgFiles, options) .then(glyphDatas => { return exports.byGlyphDatas(glyphDatas, options) }) }
